sequenceDiagram %% diagram created with https://mermaidjs.github.io/ feel free to use the live editor at https://mermaidjs.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/ to modify participant Alice participant Bob participant Vault Note over Alice,Vault: Alice Shares a item with Bob Alice->>Vault: (15) Request List of items [GET /items] Vault->>Alice: (16) Return items Alice->>Vault: (17) Request List of Connections [GET /connections] Vault->>Alice: (18) Return connections including id and public key Alice->>Alice: (19) Generate DEK Alice->>Alice: (20) Encrypt DEK with Bob's public key from connection Alice->>Alice: (21) Encrypt item data with new DEK Alice->>Vault: (22) Create Share using re-encrypted data, connection ID,
item ID, and encrypted_dek [POST /items/{item_id}/shares] Vault->>Alice: (23) Return share created
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将(15) Request List of items [GET /items]分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含(16) Return items这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 关于(17) Request List of Connections [GET /connections]、(18) Return connections including id and public key，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将(19) Generate DEK分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 关于(20) Encrypt DEK with Bob's public key from connection、(21) Encrypt item data with new DEK，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个设计看起来不错。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将(20) Encrypt DEK with Bob's public key from connection、(21) Encrypt item data with new DEK分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理(20) Encrypt DEK with Bob's public key from connection、(21) Encrypt item data with new DEK？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance:
(22) Create Share using re-encrypted data, connection ID,
item ID, and encrypted_dek [POST /items/{item_id}/shares]主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance:
确认一下，(22) Create Share using re-encrypted data, connection ID,
item ID, and encrypted_dek [POST /items/{item_id}/shares]是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由(23) Return share created组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，(23) Return share created的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达(23) Return share created结束。
